Hello, everybody. I'm Nick, and in this video, we will talk about the why startups and small companies don't use .NET and C# that much compared to other languages like JavaScript and TypeScript.

Check out my workshops: https://dometrain.com/workshops/

Title: Why Startups Don't Use .NET and C#
